SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class SuspendedGameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameManager
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.SuspendedGameManager
public class SuspendedGameManager extends GameManager
The SuspendedGameManager class is responsible for managing the game when it is suspended.
It extends the GameManager class.
Since:
28/04/2023
Version:
3.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

      gameState - the previous GameState before the game was suspended

  • Method Details

    • dragTilesToBookShelf

      public void dragTilesToBookShelf(ClientInterface view, List<Coordinate> chosenTiles, int chosenColumn)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses.
      Allows dragging tiles to the bookshelf. This method is called when dragging tiles to the bookshelf in the suspended state.
      It prints an error message to indicate that the method was called in the suspended state.
      Specified by:
      dragTilesToBookShelf in class GameManager
      Parameters:
      view - the ClientInterface view of the player.
      chosenTiles - the list of chosen tile coordinates.
      chosenColumn - the chosen column index.
      See Also:
      • ClientInterface
      • Coordinate

    • registerPlayer

      public void registerPlayer(ClientInterface view, String nickname)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses. Registers a player with the specified nickname and view. This method is called when registering a player in the suspended state. If the player exists and is in a disconnected state, it updates the player's view and state to connected. If there are still enough connected players to resume the game, it restores the previous game state and transitions to the MidGameManager.
      Specified by:
      registerPlayer in class GameManager
      Parameters:
      view - the ClientInterface of the player
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      See Also:
      • ClientInterface

    • setNextCurrentPlayer

      public void setNextCurrentPlayer()
      Protected abstract method to be implemented by subclasses. Sets the next current player in the game. This method is overridden and does nothing in the suspended state.
      Specified by:
      setNextCurrentPlayer in class GameManager
